website_summaries.verdict: Focus on design and lasting durability for long-term results.
pros: CrossFit friendly and also easy to use at home
Reviews rave about the strap's ability to isolate abdominal muscles during pull-up workouts
Your workout will be tough, supported by a gentle ab product

customer_reviews.title: My Gym members love these straps and I love the splash of color ...
customer_reviews.text: My Gym members love these straps and I love the splash of color and attitude. I had a 278 lb client on these so I know they are strong.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great Solution
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting to get into a more calisthenic oriented workout and with a bad wrist and elbow issues, it's difficult for me to build the necessary muscle base in order to get things going. The Ab strap has solved this for me as it allows me to rest on my upper arm/pit area releasing my wrist and elbow of the pressure. Not to mention hanging leg raises are so much better on my back than normal crunches on the floor. As you can see from my picture, I put them on the pullup bar I have and they fit perfectly. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Great add-on to my home gym
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned some straps before that began to cut me after using them for a while because of the nylon stitching and edges. These are great because the smooth fabric that lines the arm section does not hurt you as others do. I really enjoy using them without fear and losing concentration in my routine. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra11

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to hold the bar and do crunches, leg pulls, knee raises, etc. With these, my hands don't get tired, you get such a better hold, more controlled movement. My husband and I use them 2-3 times weekly. They hold up incredibly well to both of us using them.
customer_reviews.author: MissTBee

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I missed having ab straps at my gym when I moved, so I decided to add these to a recent pullup bar I installed. The quality on these is surprisingly good, especially at this price point. They are comfortable and large enough to spread your weight across your entire lower tricep. I'm able to do crunches, leg lifts, pikes and windshield wipers with no concern of these things holding me up. I'm very happy and have used them several times since receiving them. They even arrived early!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A.

customer_reviews.title: Get them asap and build that core
customer_reviews.text: Couple months in and they have held up. I'm 225 and have putting in work with them. So far so good . Installed on titan rack
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this product!! Bad quality!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the carabiners came defective ( it doesn’t open or close, you can’t even remove the strap) and as a result, I was unable to utilize the product. Really bad craftsmanship and quality of this product. This item could be very hazardous due to the poor construction and can result into harming someone ( apparently neither amazon nor this company have any regard for consumers safety). Stay away from this company. Really bad quality overall , and shame on you Amazon for the terrible customer service and quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Milo C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'8 215 lbs and they hold up well. These straps are exactly what I needed. Love all the color options. They feel sturdy so far and get the job done. I Got tired of searching for ab straps at the gym and now I don't have to. You can't beat it for the price of these straps. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DDominguez

customer_reviews.title: Like it but not in Love.
customer_reviews.text: I have some other DMoose products and very impressed. To give this a fair review I have to mention a few things I personally did not like. Straps seemed like they would break too easily and I'm not a big guy. Second the length was too short, I found it hard to get them on. Over all good Straps. I'd recommend check out their other products too.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have had these straps for about two weeks now and have used them everyday. I have them hanging from my doorway pull-up bar and they are sturdy and comfortable. I have tennis elbow and these take the pressure off nicely so I can do leg-ups. Considering their cost, I think they were a great purchase. For those who have specific concerns, I will say that I am a small guy, 5'2" and around 145 lbs but even so, I would estimate they could easily hold more weight.
customer_reviews.author: Nick G

customer_reviews.title: A bit too short
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product seems fine. But depending on the application, they may not work. I put them on my Gronk pull up station and they are just too short for me to use. I wish they were adjustable! Update: I was contacted by DMoose and they offered to replace and/or refund my money. I told them that I had already returned it and they took care of me. Again, I admit that the quality is great but they just don’t work for my application. There are plethora of choices out there when it comes to pull up bars and stations, just be sure to check the length.
customer_reviews.author: B.D.

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest and least well made ab straps I've ever seen. I was shocked at how light weight they were and the clips are roughly key chain quality. I suppose they all work about the same. One advantage to this one is that if you decide to take your own set to the gym, they will take up very little space or weight in your gym bag.
customer_reviews.author: AugustaDoc

customer_reviews.title: Much more comfortable than other similar products that I've used
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a very well made product. Works perfectly, and is much more comfortable than other similar products that I've used. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: K Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Carabiner was broken upon arrival and thin material cuts into your tri’s
customer_reviews.text: One carabiner was broken and one was just cheap. I purchased two new ones from a local hardware store for $6.00. I haven't tried the straps yet, most likely tomorrow, and will update the review. Just tried them. Too short and too painful. The thin material cuts into you and their is no obvious place to rest your hands or grab on. I kept my new carabiners and threw them in the trash can at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: C. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Too short, bad design
customer_reviews.text: The straps that hang from the elbow support pads are far too short to actually hang from a cable machine. You could barely fit your arms through, without hitting your head on the support bar.
customer_reviews.author: R&RG

customer_reviews.title: ... A While Back And I Must Say I was easily impressed and satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I Received My Ab Straps A While Back And I Must Say I was easily impressed and satisfied. The sleeve is very comfortable and does not scratch the arm pit and they are thus far durable and lasting to hang from the pullup bar I use them for. I also want to thank you guys for smooth no hassle efficient service and bless you in your expanding business.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy Carter

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but adjusting the straps could be better
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be very durable and the amount of padding is fine. My one complaint is that adjusting the strap length (if you have shorter arms like I do and would rather hold the bar than the straps) is accomplished by just wrapping the strap around the bars a couple times. This is fine I guess, except a carabiner will sometimes shift in place while I'm doing leg raises, causing a brief instability on one side. It's not a huge deal, I just wish there were a more sophisticated and stable method of adjusting the straps (the product description specifically mentions adjustability as a feature) other than just wrapping the straps around the bar. Not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: N. Dykstra

customer_reviews.title: just under 21" length when hung
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service. I bought this because the product photo shows it's 26.25" in length when hung, but it's actually just short of 21" when hung. It's comfy enough, just not long enough for my setup. It really helps with ab workouts! Five stars for excellent customer service and product.
customer_reviews.author: BonumSufficit

customer_reviews.title: Focus on your abs not your grip.
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to set up and made leg lifts easier as it took the pressure off my finger grip. As a result, I am able to focus on my abs and not worry about holding on to the pull-up bar. I have not had this long enough to comment about sturdiness however it looks and feels like it is of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amir Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: The straps arrived just as pictured, however, one had a defective carabiner. This should have been caught when it was assembled, but somehow made it to me. Regardless, I will replace on my own given they are just a couple bucks. As for using them, they worked well. Padding leaves something to be desired, but for the price, I expected this. I can't speak to the durability given I've used them once, but even if they last 6 months they will be well worth the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena A.

customer_reviews.title: Good construction, but little to no adjustment
customer_reviews.text: These straps feel very high in quality and are fairly comfortable, with no noticeable discomfort after hanging for about five minutes. The biggest downside however is there is basically no adjustment. In the instruction booklet it mentions that if you need the straps shorter to just wrap them around your bar a second time. This not only made my straps incredibly short, but the metal carabiners that make the straps a loop started digging into my wooden bar.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great if you want a static approach
customer_reviews.text: The issue which needs to be addressed with these Ab straps is 2-fold, They need to have a better way to connect to a bar that hangs between a door jam. Second they need to have adjustable straps to lengthen to the individuals height needs. Totally useless without these 2 things being implemented unless you are wanting a basic static system only allowing you to do one heigh and hope that you are at least 6 feet tall to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Don't count the reps until the burn starts!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'4", 250 lbs and these hold me no problem. I've used ones that were more commercial grade but they belong to the gym. For personal use thses are just fine. Nice product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: About 10 uses in and I really like these. They are very comfortable under the arms. I can see the possibility of wearing where the carabiner meets the webbing loop. It creates a pinch point at the bar. The webbing loop should be longer. Working great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Juss

customer_reviews.title: I would like to give them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable to use. They worked out perfect for me. My pullup bar is mounted in the basement and the ceiling is low. No way I could do ab exercises from a dead hang on this bar. I had a problem with one of the carabiners but customer service was very responsive. Still have to deduct a star. Use your own carabiners if you have them.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Bershak

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Great home gym addition
customer_reviews.text: The boyfriend wanted to try these to mix up the ab routine. Great idea! These are really well made, attractive - easy to integrate into a gym setup. We have them hanging from a wall mounted pull-up bar. Easy to slide them to the side, or adjust distance between them depending on who is using them, or if we are using the bar for something different. Nice, affordable product - expect them to last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: M. Guay

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is intended for
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one to replace a different brand that came used and was uneven. I am very happy with it. I use them, as does my 76 year old neighbor (she is in great shape). We have a step stool to reach it to do crunches. I wish it had some cushioning in the sling for more comfort and a few times I have gotten a small/minor amount of rash under the triceps. It is evenly hung and I am glad the carabiners are offset so it does not make marks on my gym. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie E

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, nicely made just a solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is just what you need. the straps are comfortable easy to use. Will they hold up a 400 lb. worlds strongest man competitor not really sure. For the rest of us who weigh half of that they are very secure. It was the right purchase for me without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: returned after 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: very uncomfortable. the straps have to be wider to allow your tricep to rest fully, these things are cutting into your arms... how could someone sell this, without even trying to use it? the carabiner hooks are also pretty flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: vko

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Just one word: Excellent. The abs straps are really well done. Very confortable and very sturdy at the same time. High quality finished. I love the idea of putting the clippers not in the middle but slightly too one side, that’s give you the choice to used them on any bar size. I highly recommend. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: lunaG2007

customer_reviews.title: Good for crunches
customer_reviews.text: I like it though it could be designed better. I see that you have to be careful to adjust it such a way that the metal hook doesn't rub against the top bar. Secondly it should have been made little longer. I am 5.8 and 1/2 and do need a stepper to go set myself comfortably to start crunching up. Otherwise it is good. I am not sure why the review asks me to rate the "Stretch" because there is no elastic on it and thus no stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Vb

customer_reviews.title: Six-star product on a five-star rating scale!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase. The straps are long, and the thick padding is very comfortable. The straps are adjustable and the color matched my home gym decor. The seller is very responsive to questions and comments. I'm happy with my purchase. I had an issue with my original purchase. Customer service was excellent and a replacement was shipped to me quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tesa W

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I wish I bought these a long time ago. The alleviate the stresses on the hands and wrist as you get from using other straps or ropes. This allows much heavier weight to be used when doing cable crunches.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Brunhuber

customer_reviews.title: Can't use it -- they say it's a pair but I only got one.
customer_reviews.text: The listing says you get a pair of straps but I only got one. I ordered this back in June but I just now pulled it out because I've been waiting to get my rack. Now I have just one strap and I'm mystified because I was supposed to get 2.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Ross

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. We'll made and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I use these 4 or 5 days per week. These are very well made and very comfortable. The hanging straps are plenty long. In fact it would be ok with me if the straps were 2 inches shorter. I have no complaints, and would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great Ab Straps!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time ever using this type of exercise equipment. I've been doing other type of core exercises and now I've incorporated the ab straps. I hang them off my pull up bar attached to my squat rack cage. They work perfect. The straps seems to be well built and should last a lifetime. I recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: NVDarkfrog

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is key
customer_reviews.text: The ab straps are asymmetrical so I guess there is a right and left side. Rigged them up both ways to see what was more comfortable. Could have used more padding around the inside as material is scratchy to the arms. With the arthritis of my hands and fingers, gripping the strap is difficult and uncomfortable Otherwise, it does work the abs!
customer_reviews.author: Popie

customer_reviews.title: I liked the construction and was grateful that it did not ...
customer_reviews.text: Really well made and a challenge for my abs. I liked the construction and was grateful that it did not pinch the back of my arms or cause bruising. Now I just need to get fit!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Salvini

customer_reviews.title: Just like the gym
customer_reviews.text: These are functional and are like the ones you would find in the gym with the exception of not having all the disgusting sweat in grossness from other people. If you have a way to hang these in your home I recommend them for home use or if you wanna put them in your bag if you're really dedicated you can avoid the grime and disgusting other people's body odor
customer_reviews.author: A. Cuevas

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: have mounted on chin up bar btw. living room/kitchen entrance. This placement for me is ideal as I am more likely to use whenever strolling thru small apt. The straps nudge the side of my face walking past, so why not work the abs? And yes, I am seeing 'some' tummy definition. Good price point too - happy.
customer_reviews.author: Myost Pitts

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing! It's so fun, easy, and reeeally helped my lower back pain.
customer_reviews.text: So easy, stable, fun to use, comfortable, secure, and the list goes on and on. Ab exercises were murder on my back- but not these. Every morning I actually LOVE to use this for a few minutes to loosen up any tightness & I can definitely feel a difference in my core (& see it too).
customer_reviews.author: DesertReal

customer_reviews.title: Seem really good - I hope they hold up
customer_reviews.text: I have over a thousand crunches in and I am a touch over 200 lbs. They are comfortable and don't leave as many marks on my arms as the straps at my expensive gym do. I like the cool logo. Hope they last - I did not rate durability or sturdiness - both seem good - but want to make sure they continue to perform before I give a rating.
customer_reviews.author: reo670

customer_reviews.title: Really solid straps
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic, I hang them from my gymnast rings straps so that I can do more suspended crunches and levers after my arms get sufficiently wasted. These are surprisingly adequate, especially for the price. They're not super cushy or padded,just very basic, which perfectly suits my outdoor gym configuration.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: They get the job done — and then some
customer_reviews.text: I've only used them once, but they were what I needed as I have a pull-up bar in the doorway and wanted to add some variety to my ab workout. I miss the apparatus at the gym that allows the same movement, but this product is a nice substitute. And maybe even superior. Whereas the gym equipment prevented my body from swinging back and forth, Hanging Ab Straps force me to work at it, perhaps giving me an even better ab workout.
customer_reviews.author: T.R.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for your home gym activities
customer_reviews.text: I really like the DMoose Fitness Ab Straps, work great with my over the door Iron Gym and Iron Gym Extreme pullup bars. Great support, it helps isolate your knee raise ab and obliques exercises. Must have for home or gym use.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Moncher

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My husband replaced a few weight room items with a pull-up bar and other hanging workout items. These straps are perfect for our family with weights ranging from 91-200 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: happy T

customer_reviews.title: Nice straps, nice seller communication
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I didn’t notice when I ordered but the straps hang by cloth, not by carabiners like those at the gym. That protects the coating on my bars which I really appreciate. Also, the seller’s communication is quite refreshing. Very well done emails and follow up.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great abs straps
customer_reviews.text: These are really good. They hang from the fabric part and prevent scratching your equipment. Also they hold pretty good, I am 220 pounds and they feel super solid.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these along with a pull-up bar from Amazon. These straps are well built, sewn well and handle my weight easily. I am 220 pounds. The straps are comfortable and take pressure off of the shoulder as opposed to hanging by your hands from the pull-up bar. Great product
customer_reviews.author: EdoardoG

customer_reviews.title: working towards a 6-pack
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the ab strap, I tried it and it felt like my shoulder was a little stressed and hurting. After about a week, it started feeling more comfortable and really felt my abs working. This is better than doing any floor work for abs. Looking forward to working my abs and getting stronger and closer to a six pack, instead of a keg. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Gonz

customer_reviews.title: This product is a must
customer_reviews.text: First off training abs on the ground is not the best way to do it. You need to have resistance against gravity that's where hanging ab exercises are best. But then you get tired of hanging and can't train your abs. I've been using this everyday!! Makes ab training much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: confident they will hold me
customer_reviews.text: I use the ab straps on my gym bar for leg lifts or splits. They are so much more comfortable than holding onto the bar which allows me to do more work outs using them. They are high quality and I am very happy I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Stone

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend these to anyone honestly...
customer_reviews.text: These things are EXTREMELY short in strap length. They should think about making them adjustable because once you toss the strap over the bar and clip it, you can barely reach the straps to put your arms through them, if at all! I'm very displeased with this product overall.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize that the carabiner clips on these straps are very small. They don't fit around the standard pull-up bar seen at most gyms. Instead, you use the straps themselves to wind around the pull-up bar, and clip the carabiners close to where your hands would be. It's not what I expected, or have used in the past. The overall feel is not very sturdy and it's awkward to loop them over the bar and get them even on each side. Like I said, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT OCONNOR

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great product. Was a bit disappointed in the latches, they weren’t “smooth” so it was kind of hard to put the strap through, but other than that it’s great. The functionality of the straps have helped me with trying to get my legs up to my elbows.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Holding up well for three people using it 3x a week. 270lbs 180lbs 135lbs All doing 3-4 sets of 20-15 reps... Not a stitch has snapped or any tears in the fabric. I'm impressed and it looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Cruiser

customer_reviews.title: Not as long as depicted in photo
customer_reviews.text: Size of these straps are Misleading. We are practically eating the pull-up bar trying to use them. Straps aren’t long enough for your face, let alone your head, to clear the bar that they are strapped to. Otherwise, they seem to be made fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: DMOOSE Isolating the Abs
customer_reviews.text: DMOOSE makes some of the most durable stuff out there. My only complaint is that the straps (themselves) are too short for a tall person (i.e., guys with long forearms). Aside from that little bit of discomfort they are durable and take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Face

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Great value, they're not the most supportive in the whole world but theey work amazing for me. I'm 170 lbs and I use them for ab workouts often. If I were above 220 I might go for something more heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Top 500 Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5". 150lbs, athletic build - these straps work perfect for me and I feel secure that they aren't going anywhere. I don't need to adjust them which is great because they aren't adjustable. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Venus TCD

customer_reviews.title: Well-made product and excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: These straps are very well made and comfortable to use. Additionally, an issue I had with my order was quickly resolved by DMoose customer service, which I greatly appreciated. I will definitely being buying fitness products from them again.
customer_reviews.author: babradl1

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: We received these and they work very well. My son and I both used them and they worked great for both of us. He is 6' and I am 5'7" and neither of us had any problems using them. We are both over 200 lbs and they are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective hardware
customer_reviews.text: The straps themselves feel solid and high quality. My problem is with the carabiners. As you can tell from the pictures they're rusted out from the hinge so they were stuck closed and when I finally got them open they didnt spring close. I will be doing an update once I get new carabiners on them to actually use them.
customer_reviews.author: Armando C.

customer_reviews.title: Ab straps were good quality but strap length was
customer_reviews.text: Ab straps were good quality but short in the length department. I added an additional strap to increase the distance from the Pull up bar. This enabled me to grip the straps for added support while doing the ab workouts.
customer_reviews.author: S.O.

customer_reviews.title: Too Short But decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I received these a few days ago and was really excited to have my first workout with them. Unfortunately on of the caribeeners was jammed shut and now has no spring action. This doesn’t necessarily affect its function but I am a bit concerned it will fail over time. My biggest gripe is how short it is. I have to put myself in an always position to avoid the bar and my arms are a bit too long to comfortably support myself. Overall if you are a over 6ft I would consider looking elsewhere. For the price I will likely make them work until they fail.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew McArdle

customer_reviews.title: Well Built...!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this my Dad and he really likes it. I have a similar product that I have had for many years. I actually like this product better because my older type isn't as wide under where your arms rest, hence it is not as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a well built product. Could use a little thicker padding., But that being said Ive use them several times already and they seem very well made. I'm 251lbs and they seem very sturdy, very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan K.

customer_reviews.title: Rusted/corroded latches
customer_reviews.text: The clamps arrived rusted, so rusted that one has lost the spring closeted mechanisms functionality. I rated down simply because I wasn’t sure how long these things would last. I’m an aircraft mechanic and my experience with rust has always meant the integrity of the metal is compromised. The straps work for what I need them to for now however lacking the trust of the latches is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: abs
customer_reviews.text: Really get a great hanging ab workout without taxing out my shoulders. Great for abs. No people not for pullups for abs. These are designed for ab work. Use them for this purpose and you will like them.
customer_reviews.author: Leanna Merck Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made, but returned it.
customer_reviews.text: They are well made straps; however, they were little short for my pullup bar which is permanently installed. I would have hurt myself while trying to jump to use these, so returned them and I continue doing leg raises on my bench instead
customer_reviews.author: sean.diegan

customer_reviews.title: Well made!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! In searching for ab straps, I read a lot of reviews of straps falling apart or not holding weight. I weigh 190 and use ankle weights to do hanging leg raises and have had no issues. I also have an outdoor gym and the straps remain outside. Very happy with them! I recommend other purchase!
customer_reviews.author: FrenchE88

customer_reviews.title: Order or have additional length straps.
customer_reviews.text: Not long enough for a typical gym rack. Needs additional nylon straps or carabiners to hang low enough. Otherwise, you have to stand on a bench to get them properly positioned. I am pretty agile and the trouble of trying to get into position is simply not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Eng208

customer_reviews.title: However the customer service for DMoose was excellent. This product didnt work out
customer_reviews.text: The strap positioning where it sits on the bar was rly inconvenient. However the customer service for DMoose was excellent. This product didnt work out, but willing to try another. Thank you for your email.
customer_reviews.author: K. Park

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought from viking originally which were poorly sized and uncomfortable which were than returned. Bought these as a replacement. Sizing was much better. Easy connection. Arm comfort is much better
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality
customer_reviews.text: Soft padding to hang there with. It fits me a smaller armed person just fine. I am sure it would fit larger people armed people. I am 170 pounds and it has no stretch at all. Is more then I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: kyle pulver

customer_reviews.title: Gym
customer_reviews.text: Work good, only complaint would be I wish they were a little longer. I’m 5’9 I’m sure if you are 6’0 and above they might be too short for you. I would buy again as it does work fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: JayTeez

customer_reviews.title: Good with small flaw.
customer_reviews.text: The carabiner hits the bar when you move. Obnoxious. I replaced it with a nylon strap and it’s great. It’s not convenient any more. Good stitching, thick material, and comfortable padding.
customer_reviews.author: Mikeythefireman

customer_reviews.title: Caribiners (hooks) are WAY undersized. Gotta go to hardware store.
customer_reviews.text: Not very thick padding. So I see these maybe wearing out quickly. We will see. Bigger issue is that the carabiners (metal hooks) are very small and underspec’d for the straps. They won’t connect to anything bigger than 1 inch in diameter unless you buy bigger Caribiners. Would be at least four stars if I didn’t have to make a trip to the hardware store during A pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Maselli

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Very good quality. I purchased these because I already have the d ring ankle straps and have recommended them to so many women because they work great and hold up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Sturma

customer_reviews.title: the straps are short
customer_reviews.text: other people said the same thing. i didn't listen figuring it didn't matter since I'm only 5'4. No, it's too short.
customer_reviews.author: LBC

customer_reviews.title: Just Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Currently deployed to Africa my team wanted to stay fit as possible and decided to try the straps. Not a day goes by that they are not used. Very durable material. Keeps us motivated... thanks DMoose....
customer_reviews.author: jeffery smith

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Hooked these up to my ab bar and it works like a charm. I have been using for several months now and it is lasting with no wear and tear. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Hang All Day
customer_reviews.text: They seem a bit thin at first glance. After several uses, I see they will last for a long time. I weigh 192 and have full confidence they will support me with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Abel

customer_reviews.title: Overall a Good Product
customer_reviews.text: overall a good product, was looking for a little more padding. About a minute into do hanging abs, my arms start to tingle, i think more padding could help. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: good life

customer_reviews.title: Great price and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I've used a couple other brands at gyms/friends garages and these have performed on par with all the others I have used. They are considerably smaller than others so we will see how they last over time.
customer_reviews.author: JimH

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy ab hooks since the gyms are closed due to covid19. The hooks are not comfortbale on the elbows when doing lower abdominal extensions and are short for a 6 foot tall male. Otherwide they do the job fine
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: They look smaller and cheaper and doubtful durability
customer_reviews.text: They are smaller than they appear in the picture, expected the overall quality to be better but they look cheap Chinese knock offs. Sorry not really impressed
customer_reviews.author: Sagar

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Stable straps and comfortable to use. I have been using them every other day for a couple weeks. Threading appears to be tight and not falling apart. The carabiner clips are cheap though and are already loose. Minor flaw in an otherwise functional and economical gym addition.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor B

customer_reviews.title: Not as described in the listing.
customer_reviews.text: Useable, however far from as described in the listing. The straps are very short, and there is no padding. Because the straps are short your grip is right at where the straps are supported on the bar. There is no padding what so ever, making the stress on your triceps uncomfortable during use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am always hesitant in buying workout equipment form amazon... you can never tell the quality. But I decided to give this a try for an workouts in my home gym. Have to say, I was fairly surprised by the quality at first unboxing. Tried them out immediately and found them very comfortable so I can hang longer. I can see them lasting for a good amount of time before I need replacement. Definitely reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: ShabyShabnam

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy ab straps at a most reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my teen daughter; she was developing overuse wrist/grip pain from all the dangling ab work. These allow her to do her ab work and save her grip, without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: G. Weis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price. Not as comfortable as my Perfect Pull-up bands, but also half the price of those so I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kb

customer_reviews.title: good quality material but not functional
customer_reviews.text: the product is made well, but the straps are to short so if you have long arms it’s very difficult to get into, also they do not hang low enough so you’ll have to pull yourself way up to get into them, so they now sit in my closet will buy a different type
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I weigh between 200 - 205lbs. The straps works great as an attachment with my pull up bar. I have no issue with the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: I used my straps this morning and they were very sturdy. I felt very secure using them
customer_reviews.text: My order came very quick! I used my straps this morning and they were very sturdy. I felt very secure using them. Very good quality. I would suggest these to anyone! Great buy and a great price! You can’t beat it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Pitts

customer_reviews.title: strong and useful
customer_reviews.text: If you want to work on your abs, these are for you! I hate using them, because I am so weak in my core, but every day i am getting stronger! If you keep it up, you will see great results! They are strong and stitched together really well. Shipping was quick and exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: JillEReads

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to buy this for my pull up bar and it works great. I have weak wrist and this helps so much. It was easy to put on, very sturdy, and overall happy with my purchase. I use it almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: R.Scott

customer_reviews.title: Effective workouts made better
customer_reviews.text: Really nice to have something high quality and well made. Would be nice to have more padding, but a minor gripe. Overall, these do the job every time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the elbow padding makes using them easy to workout
customer_reviews.text: The DMoose Ab Straps work well; the elbow padding makes using them easy to workout. The metal hooks don't grind against the bar because of where they are positioned.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Tamayo

customer_reviews.title: No issues
customer_reviews.text: Ive been doing this product now for over a month, multiple times a week. Ive had no issues with comfort or quality.
customer_reviews.author: JMH

product_meta.title: DMoose Fitness Hanging Ab Straps for Abdominal Muscle Building and Core Strength Training, Arm Support for Ab Workouts, Padded Gym Equipment for Men and Women
feature_bullets: TARGET CORE MUSCLE GROUPS: The ab hanging straps help you tone, strengthen, and shred your core abdominal muscles to create a leaner, stronger, sexier you with hanging leg raises, leg lifts, vertical crunches, and more.

MULTIPURPOSE HOME AND GYM USE: Create an intense workout almost anywhere with ab arm straps compatible with standard door pull up bars, chin up bars, or multi gym systems, so you can stay consistent with workouts.

STRONG AND COMFORTABLE: These DMoose ab hanger straps are able to support your weight with improved stability thanks to extra wide straps, thicker edge to edge elbow padding, rip resistant nylon, and steel carabiners.

EXCITING COLOR OPTIONS: Men and women can match their gym equipment or personal workout gear with 7 great colors to fit their style including black, blue, grey, black and yellow, red and black, American pride, or red and blue.

GENUINE LIFETIME GUARANTEE: Here at DMoose we believe in creating durable, long lasting fitness products that support every rep, workout, and goal, which is why every product is backed by a full refund or replacement guarantee.
